message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $11,000 is significantly below what I'm willing to accept. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above $13,000. I'm willing to go up to $12,500 for the product. That's the highest I'm willing to go, though.
